textBeforeTable: Flat view Next unread Next Previous First Parent Forum Complain Reply   Reply with quote   was your D300 out of warranty, because mine is... and I have this problem too Repair is $0.00.Kudos to NIKON for standing behind their products.Nikon has just replaced the mirror mechanism on my D300 at no cost.Very glad for this and very reassuring that I will be buying the D4 without any hesitation in the next few months when it will be available.Thank you Mellvile Nikon. veritasvdire wrote: Feb 11, 2013
